titlStmt.titl: Deer legs; Slug and Wart; Oldtime Cooking' Clam digging with Rover; Salmon Bake; Cooking in the old days; Louse in a big house

stdyInfo.abstract:
-Elizabeth Krise tells (in Snohomish):

  • Deer Legs
  • Slug and Wart
  • Oldtime Cooking
  • clam digging with Rover
  • Salmon Bake
  • Cooking in the old days
  • Louse in a big house

-Tape copy prepared by the University of Washington Ethnomusicology Archives 7/95.

-From 2007-101-T-106, also 2007-101-T-60 (side B) and 2007-101-T-61 (side A)

useStmt.specPerm: Permission must be granted before access to recordings, transcripts and translations is made possible. Permission can be requested from Dr. David Beck (dbeck@ualberta.ca) or by clicking on the request permission link beside the file download button.

otherMat.txt: Recording of many stories by Elizabeth Krise
